Body:
self.top_node.make_node('setup.py').write(
    """from distutils.core import setup

setup(name="foo")
""")
main(['convert'])
n = self.top_node.find_node('bento.info')
r_bento = """Name: foo
Version: 0.0.0
Summary: UNKNOWN
Url: UNKNOWN
DownloadUrl: UNKNOWN
Description: UNKNOWN
Author: UNKNOWN
AuthorEmail: UNKNOWN
Maintainer: UNKNOWN
MaintainerEmail: UNKNOWN
License: UNKNOWN
Platforms: UNKNOWN

ExtraSourceFiles:
    setup.py
"""
self.assertEqual(n.read(), r_bento)
